PyICe.deps.vxi11 package

Submodules

PyICe.deps.vxi11.rpc module

Sun RPC version 2 – RFC1057

This file is drawn from Python’s RPC demo, updated for python 3. There doesn’t seem to be an original author or license associated the original file.

XXX There should be separate exceptions for the various reasons why XXX an RPC can fail, rather than using RuntimeError for everything

XXX Need to use class based exceptions rather than string exceptions

XXX The UDP version of the protocol resends requests when it does XXX not receive a timely reply – use only for idempotent calls!

XXX There is no provision for call timeout on TCP connections

Original source: http://svn.python.org/projects/python/trunk/Demo/rpc/rpc.py

VXI-11 instrument interface client

Write then read string

Write then read binary data
